full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA SLOB DPON CHEN PO DPAL MAR ME MDZAD YE SHES KYIS MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO D'I BAm KA RA SHR'I DZNYA NA DANG, BOD KYI LO TZTSA BA DGE SLONG DGE BA'I BLO GROS KYIS BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE BTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,(BYANG CHUB LAM GYI SGRON MA 'DI, ,CHA HAR DAD LDAN SGRON MA YIS, ,DPAR DU BSKRUN PA'I RNAM DKAR GZIGS, ,'GRO RGYUN MUN TSOGS MYUR 'JOMS SHOG ,'DI'ANG SHES RAB RAB RGYAS KYIS BRIS,, ,,)
author_simple: DPAL MAR ME MDZAD YE SHES,
translator_(орчуулагч): D'I BAm KA RA SHR'I DZNYA NA, DGE BA'I BLO GROS,
